name: getCharityOrg
description: This call is used to retrieve detailed information about supported charitable organizations. It allows users to retrieve the details for a specific charitable organization using its charity organization ID.

charity_org_id.description: The unique ID of the charitable organization.

X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID.description:
A header used to specify the eBay marketplace ID.

Valid Values: EBAY_GB and EBAY_US

$block: The full location, ID, logo and other details of the charity organization.

$ul: **charityOrgId**: The ID of the charitable organization.
**description**: The description of the charitable organization.
**address**: The physical location of the item.
**city**: The city of the charitable organization.
**country**: The two-letter ISO 3166 standard of the country of the address. For implementation help, refer to eBay API documentation
**postalCode**: The postal code of the charitable organization.
**stateOrProvince**: The state or province of the charitable organization.
**geoCoordinates**: Defines the format of a geographic coordinate.
**latitude**: The latitude component of the geographic coordinate.
**longitude**: The longitude component of the geographic coordinate.
**logoImage**: The logo of the charitable organization.
**height**: The height of the logo image.
**imageUrl**: The URL to the logo image location.
**width**: The width of the logo image.
**missionStatement**: The mission statement of the charitable organization.
**name**: The name of the charitable organization.

**registrationId**: The registration ID for the charitable organization.

Note: For the US marketplace, this is the EIN.
**website**: The link to the website for the charitable organization.
